meanings.definition: Knowledge of something before it happens.
meanings.sent1: Her foreknowledge of the quiz questions helped her ace the test.
meanings.sent2: The psychic claimed to have foreknowledge of the upcoming storm.
meanings.sent3: With her foreknowledge of the surprise party, she pretended to be shocked.
meanings.sent4: His foreknowledge of the market trends allowed him to make wise investments.
meanings.sent5: The ancient book seemed to hold the secrets of foreknowledge within its pages.

meanings.definition: Awareness or understanding of future events.
meanings.sent1: The detective's foreknowledge of the crime led to a quick arrest.
meanings.sent2: She had a sense of foreknowledge that the meeting would be canceled.
meanings.sent3: His foreknowledge of the plot twist made watching the movie less surprising.
meanings.sent4: The old man's foreknowledge of the village's history amazed the young visitors.
meanings.sent5: The prophet's foreknowledge of the disaster saved many lives.
